OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INCIDENTS_TENANT_ID.description: Your Azure App Tenant ID, see the screenshot to help you find this information.

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INCIDENTS_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Azure App Client ID, see the screenshot to help you find this information.

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INCIDENTS_CLIENT_SECR.description: Your Azure App Client secret, See the screenshot to help you find this information.

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INCIDENTS_IMPORT_STAR.description: Import starting date (in YYYY-MM-DD format or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format) - used only if connector's state is not set.

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INCIDENTS_FILTER_LABE.description: Only incidents containing these specified labels will be retrieved and ingested (comma separated values).
